name: Ikrana
description:
A demo made for Otome Game Jam

Synopsis:

Zan, a genius mechanic residing in the heart of a country named Norham, developed an invention with a purpose to protect her loved ones - namely the future ruler of Norham, Ramie.
With Ramie’s coronation draws near, Zan's anxiety grows .
Three men; a childhood friend, a royal knight and a mysterious vagabond from another country come to Zan’s side at this crucial time.
Who will stay by her side to discover more of Ikrana? Can love find a way to bring hope again?

The demo version of Ikrana features:

  • 3 routes

Credit:

  • Writer: toki, Jas
  • Music: David Funes
  • Artist: toki
  • Programmer: toki

We hope you'll enjoy this game. Please leave a comment or rating if you like it.
